title: Does this sound like a logo you've seen?
content:
I seem to recall seeing a logo (probably many logos) that were based around the word “ONE” in a bold geometric sans, with a numeral 1 in the center of the “O”. I can’t remember who has used a logo like this.

I;m working on a logo at work, and want to avoid it looking the logo I’ve seen before. Any ideas?

thanks!

Jonathan

 [‹ So I am finishing a logo and the client wants to pay more.](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906192738/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45789 "Go to previous forum topic") [picto font with glyph for assistance/security/staffed area ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906192738/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46019 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jonathanhughes

comments.content:
I hadn’t seen either of those before, but they’re definitely similar to the one I’m thinking of. The one I’m thinking of was probably music or TV related.

Jonathan

i remember VH1 or one of the shows on MTV having a similar logo concept also.  
most likely it’s Vh1 you’re talking about?
